UPDATE purchase
vendor_id = #{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

real_amount_total = #{realAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finance_status = #{financeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
finance_remark = #{financeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finance_time = #{financeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finance_operator = #{financeOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
